title: Other rights
context: [ยง507-71] Other rights. Nothing in this part shall be construed to impair or affect the right of the parties to create additional rights, duties, and obligations in and by virtue of the rental agreement. The rights provided by this part shall be in addition to all other rights provided by law to a creditor against the creditor&rsquo;s debtor.[L 1984, c 239, pt of ยง1]
